Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at Roosevelt.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Aberdeen
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Aberdeen, 101st, Halsted & 103rd, due to fire department activity near 103rd/Aberdeen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Aberdeen, 101st, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 103rd, due to fire department activity near 103rd/Aberdeen.

Allow extra travel time.
